review: I love my fire stick after I was able to connect to my network.  The functionality of the device is great. I really like the screen savers when you walk away or pause the device. A lot better than Netflix and I can also put parental controls on the device.  I recommend this device to others.
author: Amazon Customer "Murder Mysteries"

review: Works okay but not as good as "non-stick" Fire TV. The USB module heats up a bit which I expected and dont know the impact of the heat on its life expectancy. It doesnt sync very well and some applications (hulu+ in particular) often require re-entering of the device code. This is probably a conflict caused by using Fire TV and Fire Stick from the same account. It doesnt seem to have the same memory capacity of Fire TV and loads/updates slower. I would suggest going with Fire TV, not the Stick If you have a choice, otherwise if you need a smaller profile solution go with the Stick. Voice search isnt available on the Stick but the type in search works without hesitation.

review: Overall it is a good device, however it lags at times. the stick does not respond to the remote.
author: Furman

review: The Fire TV Stick really struggles with a weak WIFI signal.  I first set mine up in my bedroom where my Wii and smartphone stream without any major issues; in this location the Fire TV stick frequently got hung on the loading screens and then wouldn't play anything at all.  I haven't moved it yet to try it in a location where I have stronger signal.  That said, I liked the set up process and the feel of the remote.  The on-screen UI was intuitive, feature-rich and looks good.
